TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InheritanceService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class InheritanceService Implements IDisposable, IInheritanceService

summary.span: 提供了一组用于标识继承的组件的方法。

span.span: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用来找到继承的组件、 选择哪些若要忽略，并检索由服务跟踪每个继承的类的继承属性。The can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.

span.span: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索组件的所有基类的所有的字段。This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component. 实现每个字段添加到存储的内部列表标识继承级别的组件。Each field that implements is added to an internal list that stores an that identifies the inheritance level of the component. 然后，该组件被添加到指定的容器。The component is then added to the specified container.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

param.span: 要为其检索继承特性的组件。

span.span: The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.

summary.span: 获取指定组件的继承特性。

span.span: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.

returns.span: 描述此组件的继承级别的 。

span.span: An that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果组件不能继承，此方法将返回值。If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value . 否则，它将返回此组件的继承属性。Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.

This member is either a or a .

summary.span: 指示是否忽略指定的成员。

span.span: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.

span.span: if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, .

para.span: 通过重写此方法，用户可以修改继承服务将忽略的成员组成的集。

span.span: By overriding this method, users can modify the set of members that the inheritance service ignores.

para.span: 默认实现会忽略为 private、 的所有成员，并仅允许公共或受保护的成员。

span.span: The default implementation ignores all members that are private, and allows only public or protected members.
